title: co op vs ai is all bots
body: ...and i dont just mean on the other team.  im currently in a game where all of my teammates are just running down mid in the same pattern.  i've seen this bot before but not 4 in the same game.

replies.body: This definitely isn't ok, and I'm sorry you had to play a game like this :(  We do actively search, identify, and immediately ban bots as quickly as we can.  We are always improving our methods and hopefully can prevent such experiences in the future!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1Z0mizy6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-17T21:34:49.396+0000)
>
> This definitely isn't ok, and I'm sorry you had to play a game like this :(  We do actively search, identify, and immediately ban bots as quickly as we can.  We are always improving our methods and hopefully can prevent such experiences in the future!

I'm playing intermediate bots on a smurf and there's a ton.

ghost/heal boots start. Never buy any other items, just boots. Rush down mid level 1. Get super low. ghost heal run away. Repeat.

They also say "WTF" and "Frozen" in chat sometimes.

There's about 1-2 every game. And I haven't lost a game yet, so it's not like my MMR is garbage or anything.
